Class QueryParameters

Namespace
Ddap.Rest.Models
Assembly
Ddap.Rest.dll

Represents query parameters for filtering, sorting, and pagination.

public class QueryParameters
Inheritance
object
QueryParameters
Inherited Members
object.Equals(object)
object.Equals(object, object)
object.GetHashCode()
object.GetType()
object.MemberwiseClone()
object.ReferenceEquals(object, object)
object.ToString()

Examples

// Query string example:
// GET /api/entity?pageNumber=1&pageSize=20&filter=status eq 'active'&orderBy=createdDate desc

// Usage in controller:
[HttpGet]
public async Task<IActionResult> GetEntities([FromQuery] QueryParameters parameters)
{
    var result = await _service.GetPagedAsync(parameters);
    return Ok(result);
}

Properties

Filter

Gets or sets the filter expression using OData-like syntax.

public string? Filter { get; set; }

Property Value

string

The filter expression.

Examples

// Simple filters:
"name eq 'John'"
"age gt 18"
"status ne 'inactive'"

// Complex filters with AND/OR:
"name eq 'John' and age gt 18"
"status eq 'active' or status eq 'pending'"

// Contains operation:
"name contains 'Smith'"

OrderBy

Gets or sets the sort expression.

public string? OrderBy { get; set; }

Property Value

string

The sort expression with field name and optional direction (asc/desc).

Examples

"name"           // ascending by default
"name asc"       // ascending explicitly
"createdDate desc" // descending
"name asc, age desc" // multiple fields

PageNumber

Gets or sets the page number (1-based).

public int PageNumber { get; set; }

Property Value

int

The page number. Default is 1.

PageSize

Gets or sets the page size (maximum items per page).

public int PageSize { get; set; }

Property Value

int

The page size. Default is 10, maximum is 100.
